sentences.sContent: There was complete pandemonium in the kitchen.
When the verdict was read pandemonium broke out in the courtroom.
sentences.sCn: 宣判的时候法庭上乱成一团。

remMethod.val: pan(全部) + demon(魔鬼) + ium → 全是魔鬼 → 大混乱； 来自弥尔顿的著作《失乐园》中的地狱之都(Pandemonium)

trans.tranOther: a situation in which there is a lot of noise because people are angry, confused or frightened
